thread.title: BRIEF-4Sight Holdings Says Acquisition of Foursight Holdings and its subsidiaries

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-4Sight Holdings Says Acquisition of Foursight Holdings and its subsidiaries
text:
Jan 15 (Reuters) - 4Sight Holdings Ltd:
* 4SIGHT HOLDINGS LTD - FOURSIGHT SOUTH AFRICA AND ITS SUBSIDIARIES WILL BECOME SUBSIDIARIES OF 4SIGHT HOLDINGS
* 4SIGHT HOLDINGS - HAS ENTERED INTO A SALE OF SHARES AGREEMENT WITH ANTONIE VAN RENSBURG AND LOAN ACCOUNT HOLDERS OF FOURSIGHT SOUTH AFRICA
* 4SIGHT HOLDINGS - AGREEMENT FOR ACQUISITION OF ENTIRE ISSUED SHARE CAPITAL AND LOAN ACCOUNT CLAIMS OF FOURSIGHT SOUTH AFRICA GROUP WITH EFFECT FROM 1 JANUARY 2018â€‹ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136)
